pa: Wojtek. Don't get your panties in a twist, I'm sure the guy's waiting at the station.

pa: News bulletin. The man who was shot
vi: Bản tin.

en: Postrzelony w napadzie na bank w Zgierzu mężczyzna walczy o życie w szpitalu.

maybe we'll get out of this alive.
